dr.inference.distribution
Class EmpiricalDistributionLikelihood

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.Likelihood.Abstract
      dr.inference.distribution.AbstractDistributionLikelihood
          dr.inference.distribution.EmpiricalDistributionLikelihood
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Likelihood, ModelListener, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SplineInterpolatedLikelihood
public abstract class EmpiricalDistributionLikelihood
extends AbstractDistributionLikelihood

A class that returns the log likelihood of a set of data (statistics) being distributed according to a distribution generated empirically from some data.

Version:

Author:
